description: This sweet potato mash is aromatic and creamy.
name: Sweet Potato Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g sweet potato, peeled and cut into small chunks
0.5 medium butternut squash, peeled and cut into small chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and cut your vegetables into small chunks. Add canola oil to a pot a heat on medium hear. Add in the vegetables and saut√© for 2 minutes.
Add the vegetable stock and cover, cooking for 15-20 minutes until stock has evaporated and vegetables are soft.
Transfer to a bowl and mash or blend until there are no lumps. Mix in 20g of butter and season to taste.
